newsitem.title: DUBAI: ADGAS signs LPG supply contract with Geogas.
newsitem.headline: ADGAS signs LPG supply contract with Geogas.

text.p: Abu Dhabi Gas Liquefaction Co Ltd (ADGAS) has secured a liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) supply deal with Europe's Geogas for supplies between 1997 and 1999, ADGAS reported in its monthly in-house magazine.
Geogas would lift six 45,000-tonne LPG cargoes from Das Island this year with a further nine to 12 shipments during each of the following two years, ADGAS said.
Geogas has been a previous term customer of ADGAS and lifted 400,000 tonnes of LPG under contract between October 1995 and November 1996.
